name: Capitalism Lab
description: Installs the game from the installer downloaded from https://www.capitalismlab.com/download/
notes: No issues or anything else should be required.

files.game: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded

content:
exe: drive_c/Capitalim Lab/Capitalism_Lab_Installer.EXE
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded
game:
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
